description: Optery initially planned to send users' data to OpenAI by default, but walked back the decision over the weekend.
title: Privacy Service Optery Faces Backlash After Plan to Send OpenAI User Data

description: In an update to its privacy policy, Telegram says it will now share IP addresses and phone numbers to authorities in response to valid orders. The change is a dramatic switch for the social network app, which has become a hotbed for criminals.
title: Telegram Changes Policy, Says It Will Provide User Data to Authorities
